scripts.build: vite build && rm -rf dist/an-anime-game-launcher/public && mkdir dist/an-anime-game-launcher/public && cp public/runners.json dist/an-anime-game-launcher/public && cp public/dxvks.json dist/an-anime-game-launcher/public && cp -r public/locales dist/an-anime-game-launcher/public/locales && cp -r public/shaders dist/an-anime-game-launcher/public/shaders && neu build --release
